mapper.select: SELECT file_info.content_type contentType, file_info.create_date createDate, file_info.delete_flag deleteFlag, file_info.id fileInfoId, file_info.file_name fileName, file_info.modify_date modifyDate, product_image.product_id productId, product_image.id productImageId, file_info.save_file_name saveFileName, product_image.type 'type' FROM file_info JOIN product_image ON file_info.id = product_image.file_id WHERE product_image.type != 'th' AND product_image.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT Comment.comment 'comment', Comment.id commentId, Comment.create_date createDate, Comment.modify_date modifyDate, reservation_info.product_id productId, reservation_info.reservation_date reservationDate, reservation_info.reservation_email reservationEmail, reservation_info.id reservationInfoId, reservation_info.reservation_name reservationName, reservation_info.reservation_tel resrvationTelephone, Comment.score score, (SELECT avg(score) FROM reservation_user_comment WHERE Comment.product_id = product_id GROUP BY product_id ) AS productScoreAverage, (SELECT count(*) FROM reservation_user_comment WHERE Comment.product_id = product_id GROUP BY product_id ) AS commentsCount FROM reservation_user_comment Comment JOIN reservation_info ON Comment.reservation_info_id = reservation_info.id AND Comment.product_id = #{productId}
LIMIT 3

SELECT file_info.content_type contentType, file_info.create_date createDate, file_info.delete_flag deleteFlag, commentImage.file_id fileId, file_info.file_name fileName, commentImage.id imageId, file_info.modify_date modifyDate, commentImage.reservation_info_id reservationInfoId, file_info.save_file_name saveFileName, commentImage.reservation_user_comment_id reservationUserCommentId FROM reservation_user_comment_image commentImage JOIN file_info ON commentImage.file_id = file_info.id WHERE commentImage.reservation_user_comment_id = #{commentId}
